creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
inscription:
Inscription

Initialed cyper [JL] in manner of Benjamin Rhodes (designs published 1723) in rococo scroll and foliate cartouches.
markings:
Mark

Each fully marked under base.  Maker\'s mark and lion passant on bezel of covers.
title: Caster
